code: import React from"react";import SortingBar from"../components/SortingBar";import{makeStyles}from"@material-ui/core/styles";var useStyles=makeStyles({visbar:{display:"flex",alignItems:"center",position:"absolute",bottom:"0",margin:"10px"}});export default function Visualizer(props){var classes=useStyles();return React.createElement("div",{className:classes.visbar},props.arr.map(function(number,index){return React.createElement(SortingBar,{height:number,width:600/props.numBar,index:index,color:"#000000",key:index});}));}
